parameters.query:
-- =============================================
-- STAGING: Create tables
-- =============================================
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS stg_appointments CASCADE;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS stg_patients CASCADE;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS stg_slots CASCADE;

CREATE TABLE stg_patients (
    patient_id      VARCHAR(10),
    name            VARCHAR(60),
    sex             VARCHAR(15),
    dob             VARCHAR(20),
    insurance       VARCHAR(50),
    load_ts         TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

CREATE TABLE stg_slots (
    slot_id           VARCHAR(10),
    appointment_date  VARCHAR(20),
    appointment_time  VARCHAR(20),
    is_available      VARCHAR(10),
    load_ts           TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

CREATE TABLE stg_appointments (
    appointment_id        VARCHAR(10),
    slot_id               VARCHAR(10),
    scheduling_date       VARCHAR(20),
    appointment_date      VARCHAR(20),
    appointment_time      VARCHAR(20),
    scheduling_interval   VARCHAR(10),
    status                VARCHAR(20),
    check_in_time         VARCHAR(20),
    appointment_duration  VARCHAR(20),
    start_time            VARCHAR(20),
    end_time              VARCHAR(20),
    waiting_time          VARCHAR(20),
    patient_id            VARCHAR(10),
    sex                   VARCHAR(15),
    age                   VARCHAR(10),
    age_group             VARCHAR(10),
    load_ts               TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- =============================================
-- STAGING: Load CSVs
-- =============================================
COPY stg_patients(patient_id, name, sex, dob, insurance) 
    FROM '/data/patients.csv' WITH CSV HEADER;

COPY stg_slots(slot_id, appointment_date, appointment_time, is_available) 
    FROM '/data/slots.csv' WITH CSV HEADER;

COPY stg_appointments(appointment_id, slot_id, scheduling_date, appointment_date,
    appointment_time, scheduling_interval, status, check_in_time, appointment_duration,
    start_time, end_time, waiting_time, patient_id, sex, age, age_group) 
    FROM '/data/appointments.csv' WITH CSV HEADER;

-- =============================================
-- DWH: Create Schema
-- =============================================
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS fact_appointment CASCADE;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS dim_patient CASCADE;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS dim_insurance CASCADE;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS dim_status CASCADE;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS dim_age_group CASCADE;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS dim_time CASCADE;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS dim_date CASCADE;

-- dim_date
CREATE TABLE dim_date (
    date_key        INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    full_date       DATE NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    day_of_week     SMALLINT NOT NULL,
    day_name        VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    day_of_month    SMALLINT NOT NULL,
    day_of_year     SMALLINT NOT NULL,
    week_of_year    SMALLINT NOT NULL,
    month_num       SMALLINT NOT NULL,
    month_name      VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    quarter         SMALLINT NOT NULL,
    year            SMALLINT NOT NULL,
    is_weekend      BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
    is_weekday      BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);

-- dim_time
CREATE TABLE dim_time (
    time_key         INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    full_time        TIME NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    hour_24          SMALLINT NOT NULL,
    hour_12          SMALLINT NOT NULL,
    minute           SMALLINT NOT NULL,
    period           VARCHAR(2) NOT NULL,
    time_slot        VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
    day_period       VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
    is_business_hour BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);

-- dim_status
CREATE TABLE dim_status (
    status_key      SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    status_code     VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    status_name     VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,
    status_category VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    is_completed    BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
    is_no_show      BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);

-- dim_age_group
CREATE TABLE dim_age_group (
    age_group_key   SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    age_group_code  VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    age_min         SMALLINT NOT NULL,
    age_max         SMALLINT NOT NULL,
    age_bracket     VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    sort_order      SMALLINT NOT NULL
);

-- dim_insurance
CREATE TABLE dim_insurance (
    insurance_key   SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    insurance_name  VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE
);

-- dim_patient
CREATE TABLE dim_patient (
    patient_key     SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id      VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    patient_name    VARCHAR(60) NOT NULL,
    sex             VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
    date_of_birth   DATE NOT NULL,
    insurance_key   INTEGER REFERENCES dim_insurance(insurance_key),
    current_age     SMALLINT
);

-- fact_appointment
CREATE TABLE fact_appointment (
    appointment_key          SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    appointment_id           VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    slot_id                  VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    appointment_date_key     INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES dim_date(date_key),
    scheduling_date_key      INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES dim_date(date_key),
    appointment_time_key     INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES dim_time(time_key),
    patient_key              INTEGER REFERENCES dim_patient(patient_key),
    status_key               INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES dim_status(status_key),
    age_group_key            INTEGER REFERENCES dim_age_group(age_group_key),
    scheduling_lead_days     SMALLINT,
    appointment_duration_min NUMERIC(5,2),
    waiting_time_min         NUMERIC(5,2),
    age_at_appointment       SMALLINT,
    is_same_day_booking      BOOLEAN,
    arrived_early            BOOLEAN,
    arrived_late             BOOLEAN
);

CREATE INDEX idx_fact_appt_date ON fact_appointment(appointment_date_key);
CREATE INDEX idx_fact_sched_date ON fact_appointment(scheduling_date_key);
CREATE INDEX idx_fact_patient ON fact_appointment(patient_key);
CREATE INDEX idx_fact_status ON fact_appointment(status_key);

-- =============================================
-- DWH: Populate dim_date (2014-2025)
-- =============================================
INSERT INTO dim_date
SELECT 
    TO_CHAR(d, 'YYYYMMDD')::INT,
    d,
    EXTRACT(ISODOW FROM d)::SMALLINT,
    TRIM(TO_CHAR(d, 'Day')),
    EXTRACT(DAY FROM d)::SMALLINT,
    EXTRACT(DOY FROM d)::SMALLINT,
    EXTRACT(WEEK FROM d)::SMALLINT,
    EXTRACT(MONTH FROM d)::SMALLINT,
    TRIM(TO_CHAR(d, 'Month')),
    EXTRACT(QUARTER FROM d)::SMALLINT,
    EXTRACT(YEAR FROM d)::SMALLINT,
    EXTRACT(ISODOW FROM d) IN (6,7),
    EXTRACT(ISODOW FROM d) NOT IN (6,7)
FROM generate_series('2014-01-01'::DATE, '2025-12-31'::DATE, '1 day') d;

INSERT INTO dim_time (
    time_key, full_time, hour_24, hour_12, minute, period,
    time_slot, day_period, is_business_hour
)
SELECT 
    (EXTRACT(HOUR FROM t)*100 + EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM t))::INT AS time_key,
    t::TIME AS full_time,
    EXTRACT(HOUR FROM t)::SMALLINT AS hour_24,
    CASE 
        WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM t)=0 THEN 12
        WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM t)>12 THEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM t)-12
        ELSE EXTRACT(HOUR FROM t)
    END::SMALLINT AS hour_12,
    EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM t)::SMALLINT AS minute,
    CASE WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM t)<12 THEN 'AM' ELSE 'PM' END AS period,
    TO_CHAR(t,'HH24:MI')||'-'||TO_CHAR(t + INTERVAL '15 min','HH24:MI') AS time_slot,
    CASE 
        WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM t) BETWEEN 6 AND 11 THEN 'Morning'
        WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM t) BETWEEN 12 AND 17 THEN 'Afternoon'
        ELSE 'Evening'
    END AS day_period,
    EXTRACT(HOUR FROM t) BETWEEN 8 AND 17 AS is_business_hour
FROM generate_series(
    '2026-01-27 00:00:00'::timestamp,
    '2026-01-27 23:45:00'::timestamp,
    '15 minutes'::interval
) t;

INSERT INTO dim_status (status_code, status_name, status_category, is_completed, is_no_show)
SELECT 
    status AS status_code,
    INITCAP(status) AS status_name,  -- Capitalize for nicer display
    CASE 
        WHEN LOWER(status) IN ('completed', 'attended') THEN 'attended'
        WHEN LOWER(status) IN ('no-show', 'did not attend', 'missed') THEN 'missed'
        ELSE 'pending'
    END AS status_category,
    CASE 
        WHEN LOWER(status) = 'completed' THEN TRUE
        ELSE FALSE
    END AS is_completed,
    CASE 
        WHEN LOWER(status) IN ('no-show', 'did not attend') THEN TRUE
        ELSE FALSE
    END AS is_no_show
FROM stg_appointments
WHERE status IS NOT NULL
ON CONFLICT (status_code) DO NOTHING;  -- avoid duplicates if rerun
SELECT DISTINCT insurance FROM stg_patients WHERE insurance IS NOT NULL ORDER BY insurance;

-- Transform and load patients from staging into dim_patient
INSERT INTO dim_patient (
    patient_id,
    patient_name,
    sex,
    date_of_birth,
    insurance_key,
    current_age
)
SELECT
    sp.patient_id,
    sp.name,
    sp.sex,
    sp.dob::DATE AS date_of_birth,
    di.insurance_key,
    EXTRACT(YEAR FROM AGE(CURRENT_DATE, sp.dob::DATE))::SMALLINT AS current_age
FROM stg_patients sp
LEFT JOIN dim_insurance di
    ON di.insurance_name = sp.insurance
WHERE sp.dob IS NOT NULL;

-- =============================================
-- AGGREGATE TABLES: Create schema
-- =============================================
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS agg_yearly CASCADE;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS agg_monthly CASCADE;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS agg_daily CASCADE;

-- Daily aggregates
CREATE TABLE agg_daily (
    date_key                 INTEGER PRIMARY KEY REFERENCES dim_date(date_key),
    full_date                DATE NOT NULL,
    year                     SMALLINT NOT NULL,
    month_num                SMALLINT NOT NULL,
    day_of_week              SMALLINT NOT NULL,
    total_appointments       INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    completed_appointments   INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    no_show_appointments     INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    cancelled_appointments   INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    unique_patients          INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    no_show_rate             NUMERIC(5,2),
    cancellation_rate        NUMERIC(5,2),
    completion_rate          NUMERIC(5,2),
    avg_wait_time_min        NUMERIC(6,2),
    avg_duration_min         NUMERIC(6,2),
    avg_lead_days            NUMERIC(6,2),
    same_day_bookings        INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    early_arrivals           INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    late_arrivals            INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    est_revenue              NUMERIC(12,2),
    est_revenue_lost         NUMERIC(12,2)
);

-- Monthly aggregates
CREATE TABLE agg_monthly (
    year                     SMALLINT NOT NULL,
    month_num                SMALLINT NOT NULL,
    month_name               VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    total_appointments       INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    completed_appointments   INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    no_show_appointments     INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    cancelled_appointments   INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    unique_patients          INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    no_show_rate             NUMERIC(5,2),
    cancellation_rate        NUMERIC(5,2),
    completion_rate          NUMERIC(5,2),
    avg_wait_time_min        NUMERIC(6,2),
    avg_duration_min         NUMERIC(6,2),
    avg_lead_days            NUMERIC(6,2),
    working_days             INTEGER,
    avg_daily_appointments   NUMERIC(6,2),
    est_revenue              NUMERIC(12,2),
    est_revenue_lost         NUMERIC(12,2),
    prev_month_appointments  INTEGER,
    mom_growth_pct           NUMERIC(6,2),
    PRIMARY KEY (year, month_num)
);

-- Yearly aggregates with YoY
CREATE TABLE agg_yearly (
    year                     SMALLINT PRIMARY KEY,
    total_appointments       INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    completed_appointments   INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    no_show_appointments     INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    cancelled_appointments   INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    unique_patients          INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    no_show_rate             NUMERIC(5,2),
    cancellation_rate        NUMERIC(5,2),
    completion_rate          NUMERIC(5,2),
    avg_wait_time_min        NUMERIC(6,2),
    avg_duration_min         NUMERIC(6,2),
    avg_lead_days            NUMERIC(6,2),
    working_days             INTEGER,
    avg_daily_appointments   NUMERIC(6,2),
    est_revenue              NUMERIC(12,2),
    est_revenue_lost         NUMERIC(12,2),
    -- YoY comparisons
    prev_year_appointments   INTEGER,
    prev_year_no_shows       INTEGER,
    prev_year_patients       INTEGER,
    prev_year_revenue        NUMERIC(12,2),
    yoy_appointments_pct     NUMERIC(6,2),
    yoy_no_shows_pct         NUMERIC(6,2),
    yoy_patients_pct         NUMERIC(6,2),
    yoy_revenue_pct          NUMERIC(6,2),
    yoy_no_show_rate_delta   NUMERIC(5,2)
);

CREATE INDEX idx_agg_daily_year ON agg_daily(year);
CREATE INDEX idx_agg_daily_month ON agg_daily(year, month_num);

-- =============================================
-- POPULATE: Daily aggregates
-- =============================================
INSERT INTO agg_daily
SELECT
    d.date_key,
    d.full_date,
    d.year,
    d.month_num,
    d.day_of_week,
    COUNT(f.appointment_key) AS total_appointments,
    COUNT(f.appointment_key) FILTER (WHERE s.status_category = 'attended') AS completed_appointments,
    COUNT(f.appointment_key) FILTER (WHERE s.is_no_show = TRUE) AS no_show_appointments,
    COUNT(f.appointment_key) FILTER (WHERE s.status_category = 'cancelled') AS cancelled_appointments,
    COUNT(DISTINCT f.patient_key) AS unique_patients,
    ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(f.appointment_key) FILTER (WHERE s.is_no_show = TRUE) / NULLIF(COUNT(f.appointment_key), 0), 2) AS no_show_rate,
    ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(f.appointment_key) FILTER (WHERE s.status_category = 'cancelled') / NULLIF(COUNT(f.appointment_key), 0), 2) AS cancellation_rate,
    ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(f.appointment_key) FILTER (WHERE s.status_category = 'attended') / NULLIF(COUNT(f.appointment_key), 0), 2) AS completion_rate,
    ROUND(AVG(f.waiting_time_min), 2) AS avg_wait_time_min,
    ROUND(AVG(f.appointment_duration_min), 2) AS avg_duration_min,
    ROUND(AVG(f.scheduling_lead_days), 2) AS avg_lead_days,
    COUNT(f.appointment_key) FILTER (WHERE f.is_same_day_booking = TRUE) AS same_day_bookings,
    COUNT(f.appointment_key) FILTER (WHERE f.arrived_early = TRUE) AS early_arrivals,
    COUNT(f.appointment_key) FILTER (WHERE f.arrived_late = TRUE) AS late_arrivals,
    COUNT(f.appointment_key) FILTER (WHERE s.status_category = 'attended') * 150.00 AS est_revenue,
    COUNT(f.appointment_key) FILTER (WHERE s.is_no_show = TRUE) * 150.00 AS est_revenue_lost
FROM dim_date d
LEFT JOIN fact_appointment f ON f.appointment_date_key = d.date_key
LEFT JOIN dim_status s ON f.status_key = s.status_key
WHERE d.full_date BETWEEN '2015-01-01' AND '2024-12-31'
GROUP BY d.date_key, d.full_date, d.year, d.month_num, d.day_of_week;

-- =============================================
-- POPULATE: Monthly aggregates
-- =============================================
INSERT INTO agg_monthly
WITH monthly_base AS (
    SELECT
        ad.year,
        ad.month_num,
        MAX(dd.month_name) AS month_name,
        SUM(ad.total_appointments) AS total_appointments,
        SUM(ad.completed_appointments) AS completed_appointments,
        SUM(ad.no_show_appointments) AS no_show_appointments,
        SUM(ad.cancelled_appointments) AS cancelled_appointments,
        COUNT(DISTINCT ad.date_key) FILTER (WHERE ad.total_appointments > 0) AS working_days,
        SUM(ad.est_revenue) AS est_revenue,
        SUM(ad.est_revenue_lost) AS est_revenue_lost
    FROM agg_daily ad
    JOIN dim_date dd ON ad.date_key = dd.date_key
    GROUP BY ad.year, ad.month_num
),
monthly_patients AS (
    SELECT
        d.year,
        d.month_num,
        COUNT(DISTINCT f.patient_key) AS unique_patients,
        AVG(f.waiting_time_min) AS avg_wait_time_min,
        AVG(f.appointment_duration_min) AS avg_duration_min,
        AVG(f.scheduling_lead_days) AS avg_lead_days
    FROM fact_appointment f
    JOIN dim_date d ON f.appointment_date_key = d.date_key
    GROUP BY d.year, d.month_num
)
SELECT
    mb.year,
    mb.month_num,
    mb.month_name,
    mb.total_appointments,
    mb.completed_appointments,
    mb.no_show_appointments,
    mb.cancelled_appointments,
    COALESCE(mp.unique_patients, 0),
    ROUND(100.0 * mb.no_show_appointments / NULLIF(mb.total_appointments, 0), 2),
    ROUND(100.0 * mb.cancelled_appointments / NULLIF(mb.total_appointments, 0), 2),
    ROUND(100.0 * mb.completed_appointments / NULLIF(mb.total_appointments, 0), 2),
    ROUND(mp.avg_wait_time_min, 2),
    ROUND(mp.avg_duration_min, 2),
    ROUND(mp.avg_lead_days, 2),
    mb.working_days,
    ROUND(mb.total_appointments::NUMERIC / NULLIF(mb.working_days, 0), 2),
    mb.est_revenue,
    mb.est_revenue_lost,
    LAG(mb.total_appointments) OVER (ORDER BY mb.year, mb.month_num),
    ROUND(100.0 * (mb.total_appointments - LAG(mb.total_appointments) OVER (ORDER BY mb.year, mb.month_num)) / NULLIF(LAG(mb.total_appointments) OVER (ORDER BY mb.year, mb.month_num), 0), 2)
FROM monthly_base mb
LEFT JOIN monthly_patients mp ON mb.year = mp.year AND mb.month_num = mp.month_num
WHERE mb.total_appointments > 0;

-- =============================================
-- POPULATE: Yearly aggregates with YoY
-- =============================================
INSERT INTO agg_yearly
WITH yearly_base AS (
    SELECT
        year,
        SUM(total_appointments) AS total_appointments,
        SUM(completed_appointments) AS completed_appointments,
        SUM(no_show_appointments) AS no_show_appointments,
        SUM(cancelled_appointments) AS cancelled_appointments,
        SUM(working_days) AS working_days,
        SUM(est_revenue) AS est_revenue,
        SUM(est_revenue_lost) AS est_revenue_lost
    FROM agg_monthly
    GROUP BY year
),
yearly_patients AS (
    SELECT
        d.year,
        COUNT(DISTINCT f.patient_key) AS unique_patients,
        AVG(f.waiting_time_min) AS avg_wait_time_min,
        AVG(f.appointment_duration_min) AS avg_duration_min,
        AVG(f.scheduling_lead_days) AS avg_lead_days
    FROM fact_appointment f
    JOIN dim_date d ON f.appointment_date_key = d.date_key
    GROUP BY d.year
)
SELECT
    yb.year,
    yb.total_appointments,
    yb.completed_appointments,
    yb.no_show_appointments,
    yb.cancelled_appointments,
    COALESCE(yp.unique_patients, 0),
    ROUND(100.0 * yb.no_show_appointments / NULLIF(yb.total_appointments, 0), 2),
    ROUND(100.0 * yb.cancelled_appointments / NULLIF(yb.total_appointments, 0), 2),
    ROUND(100.0 * yb.completed_appointments / NULLIF(yb.total_appointments, 0), 2),
    ROUND(yp.avg_wait_time_min, 2),
    ROUND(yp.avg_duration_min, 2),
    ROUND(yp.avg_lead_days, 2),
    yb.working_days,
    ROUND(yb.total_appointments::NUMERIC / NULLIF(yb.working_days, 0), 2),
    yb.est_revenue,
    yb.est_revenue_lost,
    -- YoY comparisons
    LAG(yb.total_appointments) OVER (ORDER BY yb.year),
    LAG(yb.no_show_appointments) OVER (ORDER BY yb.year),
    LAG(yp.unique_patients) OVER (ORDER BY yb.year),
    LAG(yb.est_revenue) OVER (ORDER BY yb.year),
    ROUND(100.0 * (yb.total_appointments - LAG(yb.total_appointments) OVER (ORDER BY yb.year)) / NULLIF(LAG(yb.total_appointments) OVER (ORDER BY yb.year), 0), 2),
    ROUND(100.0 * (yb.no_show_appointments - LAG(yb.no_show_appointments) OVER (ORDER BY yb.year)) / NULLIF(LAG(yb.no_show_appointments) OVER (ORDER BY yb.year), 0), 2),
    ROUND(100.0 * (yp.unique_patients - LAG(yp.unique_patients) OVER (ORDER BY yb.year)) / NULLIF(LAG(yp.unique_patients) OVER (ORDER BY yb.year), 0), 2),
    ROUND(100.0 * (yb.est_revenue - LAG(yb.est_revenue) OVER (ORDER BY yb.year)) / NULLIF(LAG(yb.est_revenue) OVER (ORDER BY yb.year), 0), 2),
    ROUND((100.0 * yb.no_show_appointments / NULLIF(yb.total_appointments, 0)) - (100.0 * LAG(yb.no_show_appointments) OVER (ORDER BY yb.year) / NULLIF(LAG(yb.total_appointments) OVER (ORDER BY yb.year), 0)), 2)
FROM yearly_base yb
LEFT JOIN yearly_patients yp ON yb.year = yp.year;

SELECT 'dim_date' AS tbl, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM dim_date
UNION ALL SELECT 'dim_time', COUNT(*) FROM dim_time
UNION ALL SELECT 'dim_status', COUNT(*) FROM dim_status
UNION ALL SELECT 'dim_age_group', COUNT(*) FROM dim_age_group
UNION ALL SELECT 'dim_insurance', COUNT(*) FROM dim_insurance
UNION ALL SELECT 'dim_patient', COUNT(*) FROM dim_patient
UNION ALL SELECT 'fact_appointment', COUNT(*) FROM fact_appointment
UNION ALL SELECT 'agg_daily', COUNT(*) FROM agg_daily
UNION ALL SELECT 'agg_monthly', COUNT(*) FROM agg_monthly
UNION ALL SELECT 'agg_yearly', COUNT(*) FROM agg_yearly
ORDER BY tbl;
